item.title: Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast (ADS-B) System – Cockpit Display of Traffic Information (CDTI) Except TCAS Traffic Display (STC ST01103SE) (EFB Not Installed)

remarks.para: Any CDTI operative mode may be used. The following information may be inoperative:

placard.para: Placard ADS-B CDTI associated Mode "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: Refer to MEL 34-61-2-3-2 for Center Pedestal TCAS Traffic Display relief.
